pullrequest.title: parallelize position projection error correction with threads

content.raw:
The conflicts happened here for [default](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/51da88be86d146bc19b0566395a663622e4d0223/deps/opende/src/quickstep_pgs_lcp.cpp?at=default#cl-500) and [position_projection_split_refactor_4.1](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/85287f304b11333ba358257dd15e6d7f2699f094/deps/opende/src/quickstep_pgs_lcp.cpp?at=position_projection_split_refactor_4.1#cl-537) branches,    
the way to resolve is  to apply the `position_correction` changes to only `pyramid friction` model, which is the default friction model in quickstep.    

Commit [ae15ba0](https://bitbucket.org/rosebudflyaway/gazebo/commits/ae15ba010f8bbc3eb9f631a85e4fac37d94401a8) resolves the conflicts manually.  [6227508](https://bitbucket.org/rosebudflyaway/gazebo/commits/6227508d96257845b0f15a8458344904cd07a131) add small fixes.  

The above two commits should fix the conflicts between [default](#!/osrf/gazebo/src) and [position_projection_split_refactor_4.1](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/85287f304b11333ba358257dd15e6d7f2699f094/?at=position_projection_split_refactor_4.1) branch.
content.html:
The conflicts happened here for default and position_projection_split_refactor_4.1 branches,
the way to resolve is to apply the position_correction changes to only pyramid friction model, which is the default friction model in quickstep.

Commit ae15ba0 resolves the conflicts manually. 6227508 add small fixes.

The above two commits should fix the conflicts between default and position_projection_split_refactor_4.1 branch.
